Name: Grieving Echo
Title: Thunder Manifestation: Grieving Echo
Desc: That which drives the Thunder Manifestation is a much more primal fury...
Source: Reward for accepting the Tavern Challenge against the Thunder Manifestation at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives in a Friendly Fracas

Talent.Name: Grieving Echo
Talent.Desc:
$[K1]: When your active character is <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[A2402]</color>, equip this card.
After $[A2402] equips this card, immediately use <color=#FFD780FF>$[S24022]</color> once.
When your $[A2402] is on the field and has this card equipped, when an opponent with <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C124022]</color> attached takes DMG: You draw 1 card. (Once per Round)
(You must have $[A2402] in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

K1.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Combat Action</color>
K1.Desc: After you finish 1 Combat Action, it will be your opponent's turn.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>Playing a card from your Hand with this rule is also a Combat Action rather than a Fast Action</color>.

C124022.Name: Lightning Rod
C124022.Desc: <color=#FFFFFFFF>When the attached character takes DMG from $[A2402] or its summons:</color> Remove this state, cause this DMG instance to increase by 1.\n(Only one of this status can exist on the field at once. Some of $[A2402]'s skills will target the character to which this is attached.)
